text: allaah kee daya ke kaaran hee aap unake lie[1] komal (susheel) ho gaye aur yadi aap akkhad tatha kade dil ke hote, to ve aapake paas se bikhar jaate. atah, unhen kshama kar do aur unake lie kshama kee praarthana karo tatha unase bhee maamale mein praamarsh karo, phir jab koee drdh sankalp le lo, to allaah par bharosa karo. nihsandeh, allaah bharosa rakhane vaalon se prem karata hai
